name: Astoria: The Holders of Power Saga
description: Astoria: The Holders of Power Saga is a charming 35+hr RPG with an epic, twisting story, containing intricate characters and cinematic cutscenes. done in classic 90's, RPG-style storytelling.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Discreet Video Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 550 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9.0 Compatible Soundcard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4200HQ CPU @ 2.4 GHz 2.40 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GEFORCE GTX DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 550 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9.0 Compatible Soundcard
